summary: 2016 TOYOTA.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO DRIVER SIDE SEAT MALFUNCTION.  *LD    THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REPEATEDLY FOR THE MANUFACTURER TO REPAIR THE SOP ON THE SEAT WITH BETTER MATERIAL. THE DRIVER'S SIDE SEAT BOTTOM SOP CONTINUOUSLY BREAKS.   UPDATED 07/06/2017*JS   UPDATED 08/16/17*LJ    *CN  *TR
